#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
     ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("input","r",stdin);
    #endif
    int t,l;
    string s,s1;
    cin>>t>>s;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>s1;l=0;
        while(l>=0)
        {
            l=s.find(s1);
            if(l>=0)
            {
                s.erase(s.begin()+l,s.begin()+l+s1.length());
            }
        }
    }
    if(s.length()==0)
        cout<<0;
    else
        cout<<s;
}
